remove_bookmark_alert: Are you sure you want to remove this from the bookmarks?
review_ratings_helper_text: To add a review, please rate, mention the service received and write a comment below and click on the submit button.
write_about_feature: Write what you think about this feature...
filter_health_services_description: To apply filters to the health services, please choose from the given set of filters. Filters will be applied once you click the filter button
filter_pharmacy_description: To apply filters to the pharmacies, please choose from the given set of filters. Filters will be applied once you click the filter button
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong,Please try again later.
successful_edit: Successfully applied changes to OSM. Changes will be reflected within 24 hours.
please_wait_edit: Please wait! You will be notified when changes are uploaded.
